FriendGreet_03:
What a coincidence! <sp:5:1:0>I suppose fate really
wanted the two of us to run into each
other again.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>I'm sure you remember my brothers—<sp:5:0:0>
the two fools talking in circles about
swords and beasts.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I finally got fed up with them and decided
to go on a solo adventure exploring my
favorite <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff>.
You're alone too, right? <sp:5:1:0>Alone is good.<sp:5:0:0>
It means you don't have to put up with
endless, inane arguments.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Sometimes I do miss having people to
talk to...<sp:5:0:0>but still, it's better this way.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I got into a nasty argument with my
older brothers about where to go on
our adventures.
They wanted to chase down stories about
a <clr:0000>legendary sword <clr:ffff>or some <clr:0000>rumored
beast<clr:ffff>... Nonsense, all of it!
I told them, <sp:5:0:0>"Why waste our time on
crackpot theories instead of exploring
the real, tangible <clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>around us?"<sp:0:4:0>But we just kept arguing in circles.
Finally, I decided to leave them behind
at <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I wonder what the two of them are
doing now... <sp:5:0:0>Probably just where I left
them, bickering over fairy tales...
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Hey! Have you seen them? <sp:5:0:0>Have you
seen the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?

Recently, some of the ruins were hit by
falling debris and lost their shape...

But still, they're wondrous. Absolutely
worth the trip to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I mean, if the Zonai Survey Team is
studying them, you know they must
be something special!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Did those <clr:0000>floating ruins <clr:ffff>pique your
curiosity too?

That thing on top... I mean, that's got to
be a shrine, hasn't it?

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. I just wish the ruins were floating a
little lower to the ground.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>You saw them, right? <sp:5:0:0>Those <clr:0000>floating ruins<clr:ffff>
by the side of the road?

Supposedly there's a shrine on top
of them.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Which certainly piques my curiosity.
But how to get up there?

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If only it wasn't so high up...
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Say, have you visited <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>?


If you're a <clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>aficionado,
I can't recommend it highly enough!

Especially the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0> There's no
arguing with their beauty and splendor.
StartPoint_02:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Speaking of traveling... <sp:5:1:0>I wonder if my brothers
are still at New Serenne Stable, bickering about
swords and beasts...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>You can scour all of Hyrule, and you'll
never see anything quite as marvelous as
the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff> in Kakariko Village.
Truly. Words don't do them justice.


I wish my brothers could come see...<sp:5:0:0>
But that'd require them to stop arguing
and actually go somewhere!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Without a doubt, the highlight of my
adventures is <clr:0000>visiting ruins<clr:ffff>.

For instance, did you hear about the
massive <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins <clr:ffff>they found in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>?
They're calling them <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
Good name, right?

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>It's easy to understand, but something
about rings feels eternal, you know?
It's poetic.
The rumor is that the brilliant new chief of
the village came up with it.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Exploring <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> is one of the thrills of
adventuring. Especially <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> that no
one's been to before!
I hear that lots of new <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>appeared
in <clr:0000>Lanayru<clr:ffff>, to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, after
the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>There are bound to be some that have
never been explored.

But if I keep talking without taking action,
then I'm just like my brothers. <sp:5:0:0>Perhaps I'll
set off to see them myself.
RestPoint_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Say, I have time to kill!<sp:5:1:0> I'm going to teach
you a bit about weapons.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Did you know that the <clr:0000>material <clr:ffff>a <clr:0000>weapon<clr:ffff>
is made from changes its characteristics?

For example, <clr:0000>wooden <clr:ffff>weapons are
<clr:0000>flammable<clr:ffff>, whereas <clr:0000>metal <clr:ffff>weapons can
attract <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>.
That's why it's important to choose your
<clr:0000>weapon<clr:ffff> depending on the conditions of
the place you're in.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>If you want to be a first-class adventurer,
you'd better keep that in mind!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I hear that lots of new <clr:0000>caves <clr:ffff>appeared
in <clr:0000>Lanayru<clr:ffff>, to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>, after
the Upheaval.
Perhaps I'll set off to see them myself.
RainPoint_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Rain, rain, and more rain...<sp:5:1:0> When the
weather's like this, I get a little on edge.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>See... <sp:5:0:0>Once, on a day just like this, I was
holding an <clr:0000>iron sword <sp:5:0:0><clr:ffff>and it got struck
by <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>.
The pain was unimaginable. I'm getting
cold sweats just thinking about it...

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>After that, I swore I would always take
cover at the first sign of bad weather.

So... You go ahead. I'll stay here for now.
FriendGreet_00: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You're the fellow I met that one time!
FriendGreet_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh—<sp:5:0:0>it's you!<sp:5:0:0> It's...<sp:5:0:0>don't tell me...


<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's it! You're the fellow I saw at
New Serenne Stable!
